prompts: Create a majestic flying Pokemon with strong wings and a fierce look in its eyes.
I want a bird-like Pokemon that embodies bravery and has striking red and blue feathers.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles an eagle, showcasing bold colors and a powerful presence.
Make a unique flying-type Pokemon with a mix of dark and bright colors for its plumage.
Imagine a Pokemon that soars through mountains, with a proud stance and a sharp beak.
Design a majestic creature with a combination of red wings and a white head, symbolizing freedom.
Give me a Pokemon that captures the essence of the sky with its vibrant feathers and fierce demeanor.
